instructions: Image titled Remove Email Contacts from an iPhone Step 1 1 Open your iPhone s Settings. It s an app on one of your home screens (possibly in a folder called Utilities ) that has a gray cog icon. Image titled Remove Email Contacts from an iPhone Step 2 2 Scroll down and tap . It s in the fifth group of settings. Image titled Remove Email Contacts from an iPhone Step 3 3 Tap . Image titled Remove Email Contacts from an iPhone Step 4 4 Select the account with unwanted contacts. For example, if you don t want to see your Outlook Mail contacts on your iPhone, select Outlook. Image titled Remove Email Contacts from an iPhone Step 5 5 Move the Contacts switch to the Off position. Image titled Remove Email Contacts from an iPhone Step 6 6 Tap . The contacts from that account will no longer appear on your iPhone. You can re-sync these contacts at any time by moving the "Contacts" switch back to the On position. Advertisement
